rows.label: qst700704_msg0001
rows.name:
I want to get to work, but I'm
out of the necessary sand.

rows.label: qst700704_msg0002
rows.name:
And what's more, my assistant is
missing. That foolish son of mine
is still too naive in his work!

rows.label: qst700704_msg0003
rows.name:
Where is he wandering
around! He won't get off
easy when he gets back!!

rows.label: qst700704_msg0004
rows.name:
...But, there is a chance. I hope
he hasn't gotten lost in the
forest deep in Haradd Hills...

rows.label: qst700704_msg0005
rows.name:
I hope he just got lost in the woods
on the far side of the Haradd Hills
or something stupid like that...
